docs.title: Developer Documentation
docs.subtitle: Integrate Kimlik.az APIs into your application

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.description: Add "Login with Wallet" using OAuth, then start accepting payments.

oauth.title: OAuth & Authentication
oauth.description: Add "Login with Wallet" button to your app. Users log in with one click.

payments.title: Payments API
payments.description: Request payments from user accounts. Top-up balance, service fees, etc.

support.title: Need help?
support.description: Our developer support team is ready to help

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: The Payments API allows you to request payments from a user's Kimlik.az balance. After the user approves, the amount is transferred from their balance to your partner balance.
overview.scopeRequired: This API requires the wallet:charge scope. Request this scope during OAuth.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Create a payment request via API (amount, description)
howItWorks.step2Desc: User approves the payment in Kimlik.az popup
howItWorks.step3Desc: You receive a webhook when payment is completed
howItWorks.step4Desc: Amount moves from user to your partner balance

approvalFlow.title: Approval Flow
approvalFlow.description: After creating a charge, redirect the user to the Kimlik.az approval page. When the user approves or rejects, a message is sent to the popup window.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.description: When payment status changes, a webhook is sent to your backend. Set the webhook URL in your app settings.
webhooks.signatureNote: Verify webhook signature using the X-Wallet-Signature header
webhooks.completedDesc: Payment completed successfully. Add to user balance.

autoApprove.title: Auto-Approve
autoApprove.description: Users can set auto-approve limits for small amounts. For example, if a user sets a 5 AZN limit for your app, payments under 5 AZN will be auto-approved.
autoApprove.howItWorks: In this case, the charge response will have status 'approved' directly without an approval_url.
autoApprove.example: Example: User sets 10 AZN limit for Alert.az. A 7 AZN charge will be auto-approved.

support.title: Need help?
support.description: Our developer support team is ready to help

oauthDocs.title: OAuth API Documentation
oauthDocs.subtitle: Integrate "Login with Wallet" into your application

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Kimlik.az OAuth 2.0 allows partner applications to authenticate users through their Kimlik.az account. Users verify their identity once on Kimlik.az and can then use this verification across all partner sites. This eliminates the need for separate registration on each partner site.
overview.benefit1Desc: Users log in once, access everywhere

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: To integrate Kimlik.az OAuth into your application, follow these steps:
gettingStarted.step1: Contact us to register your application and receive a client_id
gettingStarted.step1New: Create your OAuth application in the Developer Dashboard
gettingStarted.step2: Configure your redirect URIs (must be HTTPS in production)
gettingStarted.step3: Choose the scopes your application needs
gettingStarted.step4: Implement the OAuth flow in your application
gettingStarted.contactNote: To register your application, contact us at developer@kimlik.az
gettingStarted.createAppNote: Ready to start? Create your first OAuth application now!

flow.title: Authorization Flow
flow.description: Kimlik.az uses the OAuth 2.0 Authorization Code flow with PKCE for secure authentication.
flow.step1Desc: Create a code_verifier and code_challenge using SHA-256
flow.step2Desc: Redirect user to Kimlik.az consent screen with your client_id, scopes, and PKCE challenge
flow.step3Desc: User reviews requested permissions and clicks Allow. Kimlik.az redirects back with an authorization code
flow.step4Desc: Your backend exchanges the authorization code + code_verifier for access and refresh tokens

pkce.title: PKCE (Proof Key for Code Exchange)
pkce.description: PKCE adds an extra layer of security to the OAuth flow by preventing authorization code interception attacks. It's required for all Kimlik.az OAuth integrations.
pkce.required: PKCE is required for all OAuth requests. Requests without valid code_challenge will be rejected.
pkce.step1: Generate a random code_verifier (43-128 characters, URL-safe)
pkce.step4: Send original code_verifier with token exchange request

endpoints.title: API Endpoints
endpoints.authorizeDesc: Opens the consent screen where users can grant or deny access to your application.
endpoints.tokenDesc: Exchange an authorization code for access and refresh tokens.
endpoints.userDesc: Retrieve user information based on the granted scopes.
endpoints.redirectUriDesc: URL to redirect after authorization (must match registered URI)
endpoints.stateDesc: Random string to prevent CSRF attacks
endpoints.userNote: Fields returned depend on granted scopes. Only requested and approved scopes will return data.

errorCodes.title: Error Codes
errorCodes.invalidClient: The client_id is invalid or not registered
errorCodes.invalidRedirectUri: The redirect_uri doesn't match any registered URI
errorCodes.invalidScope: One or more requested scopes are invalid
errorCodes.invalidCode: The authorization code is invalid or already used
errorCodes.invalidCodeVerifier: The code_verifier doesn't match the code_challenge
errorCodes.codeExpired: The authorization code has expired (5 minute limit)
errorCodes.accessDenied: The user denied the authorization request
errorCodes.insufficientScope: The token doesn't have the required scope for this request

support.title: Need Help?
support.description: If you have questions about integrating Kimlik.az OAuth, our developer support team is here to help.

docs.title: Integration Guide
docs.description: Learn how to integrate "Login with Wallet" into your application with code examples.

apps.title: My Applications
apps.noAppsDesc: Create your first OAuth application to integrate with Kimlik.az
apps.regenerateWarning: This will invalidate the current secret. All apps using the old secret will stop working. Are you sure?
apps.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {app}? This will revoke access for all connected users.
apps.secretWarning: Copy this secret now. You won't be able to see it again!
apps.regenerateWebhookWarning: This will invalidate the current webhook secret. Are you sure?
apps.webhookSecretWarning: Copy this secret now. You won't be able to see it again! This secret will be used to verify webhook requests.

form.name: Application Name
form.scopesNote: Choose which data your app can access
form.webhookUrlHint: Endpoint URL where payment notifications will be sent

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion
dataDeletion.description: How to delete your data from Kimlik.az
dataDeletion.intro: If you want to delete your Kimlik.az account and all associated data, you can do so by following these steps:
dataDeletion.step1: Log in to your Kimlik.az account
dataDeletion.step4: Confirm the deletion by entering your password
dataDeletion.alternative: Alternatively, you can request account deletion by contacting us:
dataDeletion.timeframe: Your data will be permanently deleted within 30 days of your request. Some data may be retained for legal compliance purposes.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you choose to provide when creating an account or using our services.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to process transactions, to send you technical notices and support messages, and to respond to your comments and questions.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We share your information only with your consent, with third-party applications you authorize through our OAuth system, and as required by law. We do not sell your personal information.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

deletion.title: Data Deletion
deletion.content: You can request deletion of your account and personal data at any time by contacting us. We will delete your data within 30 days of receiving your request, except where retention is required by law.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
